static PyObject* py_getWatcher ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

This script function is used to get watcher values.

The script function takes a string to the watcher value to get. It returns the associated value as a string.

static PyObject* py_getWatcherDir ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

static PyObject* py_setWatcher ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

This script function is used to set watcher values.

The script function takes a string to the watcher value to set and the value to set it too.
